title: error detectors
extract: In control systems, as you know, error detectors are used to sense and measure any error, which may occur due to the difference between the actual output and the desired output. The input level is held constant as reference input corresponding to the magnitude of the desired output.
extract_html: In control systems, as you know, error detectors are used to sense and measure any error, which may occur due to the difference between the actual output and the desired output. The input level is held constant as reference input corresponding to the magnitude of the desired output.
